SEARCH
Module com.example.pathpilotfx
Package com.example.pathpilotfx.model

Class Pomodoro

java.lang.Object
com.example.pathpilotfx.model.Pomodoro
public class Pomodoro extends Object
Represents a Pomodoro timer for managing work and break sessions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Pomodoro()
    Constructor for default 25 minutes work and 5 minutes break timer.
    Pomodoro(int work, int rest)
    Constructor for customised timer duration.

      Constructor for customised timer duration.
      Parameters:
      work - The duration of the work session in minutes.
      rest - The duration of the break session in minutes.
